column4: is it possible to switch from emerald to metacity without turning compiz off??
no as you can only have 1 window manager per X server
metacity --replace will switch from compiz to metacity
ok, but it will turn compiz off
lspci will show you what you have, you can websearch from there
then lspci will say what it is
you can then websearch for a solution using that info
did you install drivers for the device?
nope, it was working before i did an install of kernel -8 which was in the proposed updates, but ive uninstall it and went back to the other kernel and now wlan doesnt work
then you need the kernel module for your new kernel
it depends on what lspci says the wifi is, i doubt its a package too
in ifconfig i dont see wlan
what does lspci say you have/
02:00.0 Network controller: Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 3945ABG [Golan] Network Connection (rev 02)
